import React, {useState} from'react' import {Button,Form,InputGroup,FormControl} from 'react-bootstrap'; import './register.css'; function Register() { const [user,setUser]=useState({ name: "",email:"",phone:"",password:"",cpassword:"" }); let name,value; const handleInputs=(e)=>{ console.log(e); name=e.target.name; value=e.target.value; setUser({...user,[name]:value}); } return ( <>

REGISTER YOURSELF WITH ANNANDATA

User Name Email address Phone Number Your contact number should be 10 digits long. Password Confirm Password confirm password must match your set password.

If already Registered,Back to Login!

) } export default Register;
